Module RMA
Package RMA

Class CustomerAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.beans.binding.ObjectExpression<T>
      • javafx.beans.binding.ObjectBinding<CustomerAddress>
        • RMA.CustomerAddress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.beans.binding.Binding<CustomerAddress>, javafx.beans.Observable, javafx.beans.value.ObservableObjectValue<CustomerAddress>, javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<CustomerAddress>
    public class CustomerAddress
extends javafx.beans.binding.ObjectBinding<CustomerAddress>
    CustomerAddress contains all the necessary details to fully describe a customer's business address.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.lang.String address1
      address1 contains the first part of the street address as a String.
      private java.lang.String address2
      address2 is optional and contains the second part of the street address as a String.
      private int addressId
      addressId contains the Integer id for this CustomerAddress.
      private java.lang.String businessName
      businessName contains the business name String associated with this CustomerAddress.
      private java.lang.String city
      city contains the city String associated with this CustomerAddress.
      private java.lang.String country
      country contains the name of the country as a String for this CustomerAddress.
      private java.lang.String county
      county contains the optional county String associated with this CustomerAddress.
      private java.lang.String customerName
      customerName contains the customer name String associated with this CustomerAddress.
      static CustomerAddress EMPTY_ADDRESS
      EMPTY_ADDRESS is used to output an empty CustomerAddress when needed.
      private java.lang.String fax
      fax contains the fax number for this business, stored as a String for flexibility.
      private java.lang.String phone
      phone contains the phone number for this business, stored as a String for flexibility.
      private boolean showBusinessName
      showBusinessName is used to only output the business name in the computeValue function.
      private java.lang.String stateOrProvince
      stateOrProvince contains the String state or province initials associated with this CustomerName.
      private java.lang.String zip
      zip contains the zip or postal code as a String for this CustomerAddress.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CustomerAddress​(int addressId)
      Constructor for CustomerAddress that takes the passed-in addressId and fetches the address information from the database.
      CustomerAddress​(int addressId, java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String businessName, java.lang.String address1, java.lang.String address2, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String county, java.lang.String stateOrProvince, java.lang.String zip, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String phone, java.lang.String fax)
      Constructor for CustomerAddress that manually fills in all the details.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected CustomerAddress computeValue()
      computeValue returns the value representing this CustomerAddress when bound as an ObjectProperty.
      CustomerAddress createShippingAddress()
      createShippingAddress is used to create a copy of this CustomerAddress, set to show the entire address, for the shippingAddress field.
      java.lang.String getAddress1()
      getAddress1 returns the first part of the street address stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getAddress2()
      getAddress2 returns the second, optional part of the street address stored in this CustomerAddress.
      int getAddressId()
      getAddressId returns the address ID stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getBusinessName()
      getBusinessName returns the business name stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getCity()
      getCity returns the name of the city stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getCountry()
      getCountry returns the country name stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getCounty()
      getCounty returns the name of the county stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getCustomerName()
      getCustomerName returns the customer name stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getFax()
      getFax returns the fax number stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getPhone()
      getPhone returns the phone number stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getStateOrProvince()
      getStateOrProvince returns the initials for the state or province stored in this CustomerAddress.
      java.lang.String getZip()
      getZip returns the zip or postal code stored in this CustomerName.
      void setShowBusinessName​(boolean newShowBusinessName)
      setShowBusinessName is only used if the programmer wants only the business name to show in the computeValue function.
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString is used to output the content of this CustomerAddress in the appropriate form depending on the value of showBusinessName.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerAddress

        public CustomerAddress​(int addressId)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Constructor for CustomerAddress that takes the passed-in addressId and fetches the address information from the database.
        Parameters:
        addressId - The address ID to search for in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the SQL Server database or the SQL query.

      • CustomerAddress

        public CustomerAddress​(int addressId,
                       java.lang.String customerName,
                       java.lang.String businessName,
                       java.lang.String address1,
                       java.lang.String address2,
                       java.lang.String city,
                       java.lang.String county,
                       java.lang.String stateOrProvince,
                       java.lang.String zip,
                       java.lang.String country,
                       java.lang.String phone,
                       java.lang.String fax)
        Constructor for CustomerAddress that manually fills in all the details.
        Parameters:
        addressId - The int address identifier to assign to this CustomerAddress.
        customerName - The String customer name associated with this CustomerAddress.
        businessName - The String name of the business at this address.
        address1 - The String first part of the street address.
        address2 - The optional String second part of the street address.
        city - The String name of the city.
        county - The String name of the county.
        stateOrProvince - The String state or province initials.
        zip - The String zip or postal code for this address.
        country - The optional String name of the country.
        phone - The String main phone number for this address.
        fax - The optional String fax number for this address.

    • Method Detail

      • computeValue

        protected CustomerAddress computeValue()
        computeValue returns the value representing this CustomerAddress when bound as an ObjectProperty.
        Specified by:
        computeValue in class javafx.beans.binding.ObjectBinding<CustomerAddress>
        Returns:
        A String containing either just the business name (if showBusinessName is true), or the customer name, business name, street, city, county, state, zip, country, phone, and fax (if showBusinessName is false).

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString is used to output the content of this CustomerAddress in the appropriate form depending on the value of showBusinessName.
        Overrides:
        toString in class javafx.beans.binding.ObjectBinding<CustomerAddress>
        Returns:
        A String either containing the businessName if showBusinessName is true, otherwise the entire address if it is false.

      • setShowBusinessName

        public void setShowBusinessName​(boolean newShowBusinessName)
        setShowBusinessName is only used if the programmer wants only the business name to show in the computeValue function.
        Parameters:
        newShowBusinessName - The new boolean to set for showBusinessName (whether we want only the name showing or the entire address).

      • createShippingAddress

        public CustomerAddress createShippingAddress()
        createShippingAddress is used to create a copy of this CustomerAddress, set to show the entire address, for the shippingAddress field.
        Returns:
        A new instance of this CustomerAddress with showBusinessName set to false.
